  • Method Details

    • authenticate

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> authenticate(LoginDto loginDto)
      Authenticates a user with the given username and password, and generates a JWT token for the user.
      Specified by:
      authenticate in interface IUserService
      Parameters:
      loginDto - the LoginDto object containing the user's username and password.
      Returns:
      a JWT token as a String.

    • register

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> register(RegisterDto registerDto)
      Registers a new user with the given username and password.
      Specified by:
      register in interface IUserService
      Parameters:
      registerDto - the RegisterDto object containing the new user's username and password.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity object containing a BearerToken and an HTTP status code.

    • getUserRoles

      public List<Role> getUserRoles(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Gets the roles of the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      authentication - the Authentication object representing the currently authenticated user.
      Returns:
      a List of Role objects representing the roles of the authenticated user.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there is an error while retrieving the user's roles.
